page.description: Specify the name of the field in the data that should be returned when the user makes a selection in the list. The field name is case sensitive. IMPORTANT: The data type of the return value is ALWAYS a string.

section.description: You can set focus to a particular row in the List by executing the <listObj>.setValue(key)method, where 'key' is the list return value (a string). If you pass in a numeric value as the 'key' it is the zero based row index of the row you would like to select. </listObj>
